Articles.Content: *Restrains Rage097* Do you want chobit to bomb us in the Donryu?
Go for it, Rage. Let's see what the Chobit can do against the CHI SR-7 Whatchadoininmahorbit.
Care to elaborate as to the "CHI SR-7"?

*breaks free*

BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD!!!!!!!!!

*pounces*
*Strafes Rage097 with a MkXIV Spitfire*

*does this*

Image a large mountain lion

Edited May 25, 2013 by Rage097

I imagine you will have to remove that soon.

And how would you do that while I'm in the air?
I pounced trekkete

How come you guys keep sacrificing people?

You should launch rockets, and make ceremonial salutes with them before they plunge into the sun at impractical velocities made possible only by more boosters.

Only then will the Kraken be appeased.

Also best practice:

If you feel a need to ask if something should be removed or not, you probably shouldn't post it at all. Make it disappear please, you have 5 minutes.
For some reason, Rage097 wants to sacrifice Trekkette. Do you have some sort of grudge against her?
Nope! just seemed to be the more hilarious sacrifice when jedi is around.
Then could we not sacrifice anyone?

*le sigh*

Again, with the sacrificing. One would almost think you don't really want to see more of the PfL fic...

*le sigh*

Again, with the sacrificing. One would almost think you don't really want to see more of the PfL fic...

Nonononononononononono, we all want for PfL fiction!
Disregard all sacrifices.
And for safety *ties up Rage097 and injects him with sedative*
While you do that I'll steal his planes and rockets.
Bring his croissants to me.
Can we place him into the next rocket to the ISS? Preferably inside the liquid oxygen tanks?
...whatis...hrmmeg..............babydon........
Quiet you! *submerges Rage097 into liquid oxygen*
*Skin freezes and begins to shatter, exposing the circuitry beneath*
*places electrical wires into the liquid oxygen*

The technology is far too advanced to be frozen.

Edited May 26, 2013 by Rage097

There will be no sacrifices today!

Unless they are Kerbals. That's fine.
